attributes.action: Regulate the cost of how much veterinary practices can charge clients.
attributes.additional_details: Allowing veterinary practices to charge the amount they do especially in the cost of living crisis is absurd. Nobody is doing anything about this? Everything else is governed/regulated but this isn’t? It’s absolute extortion.
attributes.background: I want the government to regulate the amount veterinary practices can charge clients. From one to the other you can be expected to pay more/less it should all be regulated.
